/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street is teeming with life, filled with cars, buses, and pedestrians going about their day. The buildings that line the street are tall and modern, showcasing the architectural style of the city. The sky above is hazy, casting a soft light over the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and green, reflecting the blend of urban development and natural elements.
